videos.headline: Two defenders on Edo? He'll dunk on both of them
videos.description: Fresno State's Karachi Edo gets the ball down low and throws down the two-handed slam over two defenders for the basket and the foul.

article.description: Marvelle Harris had 22 points, Torren Jones scored six points in the final two minutes and Fresno State won its second-ever game at UNLV in a 69-66 victory Wednesday night.

article.headline: Fresno State gets second-ever win at UNLV 69-66

images.name: K. Edo made Dunk. Assisted by P. Watson.
images.caption: 1H (15:00) FRES Karachi Edo made Dunk. Assisted by Paul Watson.

article.linkText: Fresno State gets second-ever win at UNLV 69-66
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Marvelle Harris had 22 points, Torren Jones scored six points in the final two minutes and Fresno State won its second-ever game at UNLV in a 69-66 victory Wednesday night. The Bulldogs (10-4, 1-0 Mountain West) are now 2-17 at UNLV -- with their other win coming in 2013. Jalen Poyser hit a 3-pointer from the wing to give UNLV a 61-60 lead -- its first since 40-39 -- and he made another 3 about a minute later for a four-point lead. Cezar Guerrero answered with a runner in the lane and Jones had a putback to tie it at 64-all. Poyser made a reverse layup to give UNLV a lead, but Cullen Russo made 1 of 2 free throws and Jones tipped in the miss for a 67-66 Fresno State lead. Jones made two free throws with 11 seconds left and UNLV had a 3 blocked before the buzzer. Poyser finished with 11 points for UNLV (9-5, 0-1).

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
